moves.1. d4 e6 2. e4 c5 3. Nf3: now we have a Sicilian defense.
moves.3... Nc6: ...cxd is normal. now white has been granted center control.
moves.4. Be3: ...cxd4 followed by ...a6 and ...Qc7 should reach a reasonable position.
moves.4... Qa5+ 5. Nc3 Nf6 6. d5: take over the center. good strategy.
moves.6... Nd8: burying the N... not sure if ...Nb4; a3 Na6 is better than this or if ...Nb8 is best. THIS stuff is why ...cxd4 is absolutely necessary earlier.
moves.7. Nd2 b6: NOT ...b6??  ...Qc7 and if Nb5 then ...Qb8 is at least a normal strategy in similar Sicilian positions.
moves.8... Qb4 9. a3 Qxc3+ 10. bxc3 Nxe4 11. d: game is sad for  Black. Nxf8; Bxe6 Nxe6. three minor pieces against 3 minor pieces and 2 rooks.
